name: HappyStay
0:
”Alexa, open Happy Stay”
”Bring me water”
”how can I use coffee machine.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: happy stay
Developer Terms of Use
des:
HappyStay is your virtual staff for your hotel or guesthouse or house for guests.
The guests can get some information and ask service requests during his or her stay.
